tool.name: Haplotype analysis v2

param.name: vcfsubset
param.label: a vcf file of a chromosome region
param.help: You can download a region from T3: https://triticeaetoolbox.org/wheat/genotyping/download-vcf.php

param.name: maxmissl
param.label: Missing values filter for lines (0 - 1). Default 90%

param.name: maxmissm
param.label: Missing values filter for markers (0 - 1). Default 90%

tool.help:
**OVERVIEW**
Convert a vcf file to SNP file and order the individuals by similarity for haplotype analysis.
**Output**
Three files are output from the analysis:
1. A pdf file with dendrogram graph of lines
2. A raw table with line information and A/T/G/C coded genotyping results
3. A haplotype ordered table with line information and A/T/G/C coded genotyping results
